name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Statistical Programmer with extensive expertise in data analysis and a strong command of **SAS**, **SAS/Macro**, **Proc SQL**, **SAS/STAT**, **Proc Report**, and **ODS**. Proven ability to deliver innovative statistical solutions in accordance with **CDISC**, **SDTM**, and **ADaM** standards, enhancing data integrity and regulatory compliance across projects. Adept at building lasting relationships and effectively communicating complex concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Known for adaptability and a customer-focused approach, with a solid foundation in integrating technology to drive operational excellence in various sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
Conducted data analysis utilizing **SAS** and **SAS/Macro**, resulting in a 25% increase in report generation efficiency.
Designed comprehensive reports using **Proc Report** and **ODS**, enhancing data visualization and clarity for stakeholders by 50%.
Implemented statistical methodologies with **SAS/STAT** to ensure compliance with **CDISC** standards, achieving 100% accuracy in SDTM and ADaM datasets.
Developed SQL queries using **Proc SQL** to extract and manipulate data, reducing data retrieval times by 40%.
Created dynamic graphs and visual displays using **SAS/Graph**, improving interpretability of complex data sets.
Fostered strong relationships with cross-functional teams to enhance communication and ensure customer-focused solutions, recognized by management for excellence in teamwork.
Adapted to changing project requirements by innovating new approaches to data processing, leading to a 35% faster turnaround on critical projects.

Utilized **SAS** and **SAS/Macro** for advanced data analysis, enhancing reporting capabilities by 30% while adhering to **CDISC** standards, including **SDTM** and **ADaM** methodologies.
Developed and managed **Proc Report**, **ODS**, and **SAS/Graph** to generate visualizations and reports, improving decision-making speed by 25%.
Executed complex data queries using **Proc SQL**, which improved data retrieval efficiency by 40%.
Fostered strong relationships with stakeholders through effective **communication**, leading to a 15% increase in project collaboration and customer satisfaction.
Demonstrated a commitment to **innovation** and **adaptability** when troubleshooting issues, achieving a rapid turnaround time of less than **24 hours** for urgent requests.

Utilized **SAS** and **SAS/Macro** to conduct advanced data analysis for statistical programming projects, enhancing efficiency by 25%.
Developed interactive reports using **Proc Report** and **ODS**, improving report generation time by 50%.
Employed **Proc SQL** for complex data manipulation and querying, streamlining data processes and reducing project turnaround time by 20%.
Implemented **SAS/Graph** techniques to create visual representations of data, aiding in better decision-making for stakeholders.
Ensured compliance with **CDISC**, **SDTM**, and **ADaM** standards, leading to a 100% success rate in regulatory audits.
Cultivated strong relationships with stakeholders, fostering communication that led to a 30% increase in project satisfaction.
Adapted to new innovations in statistical programming, implementing them to drive continuous improvement in data analysis processes.
